column1: Services for Frank will begin with Praying the Rosary at 5:00 PM
column4: 2015 at Thompson Funeral Home at Greenlawn Memorial Park
column5: 845 Leesburg Road. Visitation will follow until 7:00. The Funeral Mass will be held at St Joseph Catholic Church
column11: 2015. Msgr. Richard Harris will be the celebrant. Burial will follow in Greenlawn Memorial Park
